seed_pair.target: No esperábamos despertar en el medio de la noche
seed_pair.known: We didn't hope to wake in the middle of the night.

S0098: I should consider playing something else.
S0099: Deberías preguntarte por qué no está trabajando
You should ask yourself why it's not working.
S0100: No deberías preocuparte por hacer algo similar
You shouldn't worry about doing something similar.
S0101: Estoy disfrutando descubrir más sobre este lenguaje
I'm enjoying finding out more about this language.
S0102: Estamos intentando decir que no es así
We're trying to say that it's not like that.
S0103: No estamos intentando oír muchas más palabras
We're not trying to hear many more words.
S0104: Necesitamos cambiar lo que estamos haciendo
We need to change what we're doing.
S0105: Por eso no sabía la respuesta
That is why he didn't know the answer.
S0106: No necesitamos sentirnos felices, solo necesitamos trabajar duro
We don't need to feel happy, we just need to work hard.
S0107: Esperábamos ver lo que estabas haciendo
We hoped to see what you were doing.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
